   14: 
   15: """Exceptions raised by the :mod:`gridfs` package"""
   16: from __future__ import annotations
   17: 
   18: from pymongo.errors import PyMongoError
   19: 
   20: 
   21: class GridFSError(PyMongoError):
   22:     """Base class for all GridFS exceptions."""
   23: 
   24: 
   25: class CorruptGridFile(GridFSError):
   26:     """Raised when a file in :class:`~gridfs.GridFS` is malformed."""
   27: 
   28: 
   29: class NoFile(GridFSError):
   30:     """Raised when trying to read from a non-existent file."""
   31: 
   32: 
   33: class FileExists(GridFSError):
   34:     """Raised when trying to create a file that already exists."""
